reviewText: My 10 yrs daughter still loves angelina .... Despite all the teenz stuff..... The stories in the dvd r realy great about frienship..... But i liked the old angelina.... I don' t know why they have to change the display of the cartoon....

This DVD sure has some Great and Wonderful Stories about working together and being a Good Friend. The Game on this DVD is sure a Fun Memory Game that Children will really enjoy. This Dvd is sure pure fun for Children and their Families and Friends!
Our granddaughter loves this series!
My 4-year-old and 5-year-old granddaughters love this, have watched it several times.
Per my Granddaughter, AWSOME!!!
Great for watching with grands   Great manners and politeness in the characters
Nice movie
My granddaughter love this show.
My 4 year old granddaughter loves this. Imparts very good values and teaches quite a bit about music.
Great for my granddaughter.
My 2 year old loves Angelina. They stopped showing it on PBS kids so we are so happy it is on Prime!

My 3 and 4 year old granddaughters love this series.  The character development and the music are so enriching and adorable.  Simply one of the finest productions for teaching the classics to children and developing a passion for ballet.
My 2 year loves her!
My granddaughter loved it.
Daughter loved it!
My six year old really likes all of these!
Great show for kids
Cute
Little girls enjoyed it
Great
My granddaughter loves watching this video.
Cute!
The skating animation was good.
One of my granddaughters go to movies!
My almost 5 yr old loves Angelina
Teaching ideas were fun for the kids
My little girl LOVES this. She is constantly pretending to "skate dance" now.
My daughter did watch it for awhile.
The kids enjoy Angelina Ballerina. I prefer the cartoon style over the animation style.
My daughter loved it!
My 3 year old daughter loves these episodes, and I can actually enjoy watching them with her!
My kids love it.
My kids loved this Angelina Ballerina Dancing on Ice movie.  I have three girls and they loved the dancing on ice with skates.  They all want to go ice skating now!
Great movie! My 3 1/2 year old loves all of the Angelina movies!
IT WAS DIFFERENT BUT GOOD
Love it. I feel good letting my daughter watch this program.
My granddaughter loved it!!!!  I like the storyline and good values it teaches.  I also think the animation is very well done!
My daughter loves all the Angelina Ballerina movies!
The girls loved it.
It's cute and it kept the attention of my 2 year old daughter, but I was not extremely impressed. It's a one time thing.
My kids loved it!
As my four year old granddaughter started ice skating this year, she particularly loved this dvd.  And you can't go wrong with Angelina Ballerina.
I got it for my daughter as a gift from Santa, and she just loves it.  She is dancing all over the house and singing all the time.
My family love this movie!
Great movie. My 5 year old daughter loved it.
A favorite if my 3-year old grand-daughter.
My daughter loves Angelina and now at 3 understands the lessons behind the stories. Angelina is a fun series that is inpowering to little girls.
It is good "girl" fun. my three year old daughter loves it! Angelina always provides little lessons that are great.
My daughter loved it.
My grand daughter loves Angelina. It is a colorful "realistic" day in the life of mouselings. Very well done animation!
My 3 yr old granddaughter loves all of the Angelina Ballerina movies!!

Absolutely Wonderful!!  EVERY little and BIG girl's delight!

A MUST HAVE!!

Thank you!!!
Great little movie for preschool.  It is full of many good lessons for kids including helping one's friends and sharing.  Kindergarten students can stand it while watching it with younger siblings.
It's my three year old favorite and she will watch these films over and over...

A perfect birthday gift for three year old Henrietta who became inspired with ice dancing during the Winter Olympics.  Her dad is official coach and Henri slithers around on the shiny sitting room floor absolutely believing that she could be up there with the medalists.  How wonderful are the imaginations of our little ones.
Perfect video for my grandchild. Good visual and audio quality. A great video to entertain the wee ones, especially the dancers.
My granddaughter is 4 years old and she enjoys watching them when she is here.  Although I did not watch it myself, it kept her entertained especially when it is so cold to go outside.
Granddaughter loved it! She watched several times! Will definitely view more like this soon. Recommend for children two and up.
My three year old loves Angelina Ballerina! Sweet show to have on and a nice change from Disney/Nick in our house.

My 7 year loved this movie!
So much she wants to watch it again.  She loves watching  ice skating on tv and this is why she liked it so much.

I watched the movie with my 7 years old daughter and we both enjoyed it very much.
I was pleased to see that unlike other movies for kids this one is successfully delivering the message about good values and moral character.
My kiddos really love it. They call it magical, and it really seems to spark their imaginations. They will be dancing and twirling for hours after watching this!
My 6 y o daughter loved it.  I could endure it.  Realistic expectations are the key to enjoying kids' shows!
My Granddaughter is taking dance classes and she is 3. Angelena Ballsrina does the correct dance steps and my granddaughter learns from that.
Kids loved the movie. Angelina Ballerina is age appropriate and teaches great lessons through imaginative story telling . My daughter loves to watch it over and over again.
Very good movie. I watch with my daughter and we had blast. Great movie for daddy daughter day. I usual designate a day during the month for just my daughter.
My 3 year old daughter loves the Angelina Ballerina series - but this one is her favorite.  She has watched it multiple times.
My granddaughter and I enjoy Angelina movies.. we dance and sing the songs, it is an enjoyment to see her happy with these great videos
I bought this for my daughter, and she really likes it. She likes most all of the Angelina Ballerina stuff. I thought it was a cute movie too.
My 2 and 4 year old daughters love Angelina!  This is several episodes so it's possible to find a good stopping poit if you don't want to watch the whole thing.
Product came clean and unscratched! My daughter loves it! Angelina Ballerina is her favorite so it was fun to add this ice skating one to her ballet ones! =)

This is a great hour long DVD full of Angelina and her friends.  The DVD is full of great songs, lessons of friendship and winter fun!  Also, even though Angelina is geared more towards girls there is a boy mouse character in it and my boys honestly don't mind the show at all!

My kid really enjoys this. It's a good wholesome story. It's one of those shows that I don't mind my kids watching. I have no worries about them picking up and bad behaviors from Angelina. It's a good low impact calming cartoon.

This one was fun because of the ice skating. It took Angelina's ballet skills and put them to the test on ice. So that spiced things up a bit.
My four-year-old granddaughter loved it. She was dancing as she watched it. Very cute!
My grand daughter loves these books
My 4 year old loved it
Great show

My daughter loves watching it!
Granddaughters love it!
My granddaughter loved watching this movie.  Heck, I loved watching it with her. :)
My 4 yr old granddaughter loves this series of shows on Amazon Prime Video!!!  She loves watching them on my Mini ipad 4. I am so happy that she loves them!!!!
